Uses of Interface
xxl.core.io.raw.RawAccess

  • Packages that use RawAccess 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.collections.containers.io
    Provides some containers that are able to store their blocks on disk.
    xxl.core.io
    Provides classes and routines for system input and output through data streams, serialization, raw i/o and a FAT file system.
    xxl.core.io.fat
    This part is an implementation of the FAT12/16/32-filesystem based on raw access.
    xxl.core.io.raw
    Contains classes and interfaces to access raw devices (disks) directly.

      RawAccessContainer(RawAccess ra)
      Constructs a BlockFileContainer that consists of existing files given by the specified file name.
      RawAccessContainer(RawAccess ra, int maxFreeListBlocks)
      Constructs an empty BlockFileContainer that is able to store blocks with a maximum size of blockSize bytes.

    • Uses of RawAccess in xxl.core.io.raw

      Classes in xxl.core.io.raw that implement RawAccess 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DecoratorRawAccess
      Decorates a RawAccess.
      class  LoggerRawAccess
      This class writes a logfile for all accesses of a RawDevice.
      class  NativeRawAccess
      This is the implementation of RawAccess via JNI an C methods which implement the unbuffered access to files and devices.
      class  PartitionRawAccess
      Allows user defined partitioning of a raw access.
      class  RAFRawAccess
      Implements RawAcces with java.io.RandomAccessFile (→RAF).
      class  RAMRawAccess
      Implements RawAccess via usage of main memory.
      class  SeekMapperRawAccess
      If you have a big hard drive and only relatively small data, then possibly all data is on the same physical cylinder.
      class  StatisticsRawAccess
      Counts the calls to a (decorated) raw access and calculates a statistic of seeks.
      class  TesterRawAccess
      Tests a RawAccess by writing the data to a second control raw access.
